customizations.markdown: # High Level KPIs to Track for App Migration

widgets.title: Dollars Processed vs Failed
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/1000 as 'Revenue'   facet name since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Top Errors in The Application
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError select count(*)  facet error.class,error.message

widgets.title: CPU Utilization by Host
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample select average(cpuPercent) as 'CPU % used'  facet fullHostname

widgets.title: Slowest Transactions in the App (Top 20)
widgets.nrql: From Transaction select max(duration)  facet appName, name since last hour limit 5

customizations.markdown:
# Suggested Business KPI's to Track 
## Needs Custom attributes

widgets.title: Average Transaction Duration
widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%/' AS 'Homepage', where pageUrl like '%/browse/plans' AS 'Deals Listing', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%login.jsp' AS 'Add to Cart',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%/checkout' AS 'Payment')  SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Revenue Through Web Portal: WoW
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal) As 'Revenue'  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Application Performance Score
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT ((filter(count(*),WHERE apdexPerfZone= 'S' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'S') + (filter(count(*), WHERE apdexPerfZone = 'T' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'T')/2))/count(*))*100 AS '% Score'  SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Application Response Time in 24 hrs (ms) : WoW
widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT average(duration)*1000 AS 'ms'  SINCE 24 hours ago TIMESERIES compare with 1 week ago

widgets.title: Most Visited End Points
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction select count(*) facet request.uri

widgets.title: Performance By Country
widgets.nrql: FROM  PageView select average(duration)  facet countryCode TIMESERIES 1 hour since 1 day ago

widgets.title: User Locations
widgets.nrql: from PageView select count(*) facet countryCode

widgets.title: Pages Viewed the Most/Duration
widgets.nrql: from PageView select count(*), average(duration) as 'Avg Duration', average(networkDuration) as 'Avg Network Duration' , average(webAppDuration) as 'AVG Web App Duration' facet appName, pageUrl

widgets.title: Hardware Utilization for Application
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample select average(cpuPercent), max(cpuPercent) , average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Average Memory Used%' where apmApplicationNames like '%WebPortal%' facet hostname , processorCount,coreCount

widgets.title: Memory Utilization
widgets.nrql: from SystemSample select average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as '% of Memory used' timeseries 5 minutes since 1 hour ago facet hostname

widgets.title: Infrastructure CPU Utilization for App
widgets.nrql: from SystemSample select average(cpuPercent) as 'CPU utlization' timeseries 5 minutes since 1 hour ago facet hostname
